content: I say “rally” because, if you’ve ever been to high school, you probably attended at least one utter waste of time known as a “pep rally.” No offense to cheerleaders and jocks, but holy shit. You dragged the rest of us out of class (that part’s fine) to sit on our asses while Minda and Tawny try aggressively (bordering on violently) to convince us to give a shit about a game whose outcome in no way effects our lives. Seems sadistic.
